scripts.test:playwright: NODE_ENV=test STAMHOOFD_ENV=playwright DEBUG=pw:browser* yarn playwright test
scripts.test:playwright:skip: STAMHOOFD_SKIP_FRONTEND_BUILD=true NODE_ENV=test STAMHOOFD_ENV=playwright yarn playwright test
scripts.test:playwright:trace: NODE_ENV=test STAMHOOFD_ENV=playwright yarn playwright test --trace on
